messages.subject: Re: Aging Unschoolers and visiting
messages.messageBody:
<<<<Shyrley

PS My hair is usually dyed pink or red or purple.
Hides the grey a
treat
:)>>>>

My hair has been all those colours too! I went blue
for awhile as well. But now I'm just a dirty blond (in
the hair colour sense - honest!). I've been au natural
for almost 3 years now.

If any unschoolers are in the Northern California
vicinity, you would be welcome to stop by here. We're
in Paradise, CA (near Chico and about 2 hours north of
Sacramento). Like Shyrley said, bring sleeping bags
(although we do have a futon in the l.r. and Tamzin
usually sleeps with me, leaving her bed free as well,
so bags on the floor would depend on how many of you
there were) and be prepared for vegetarian food! We
have 2 dogs and a cat.

Meghan :-)
